long_description: Even when traveling, dedicated athletes never miss an opportunity to train. With the GoFit Ultimate Pro Gym, your next resistance workout is in the bag. GoFit Ultimate Pro Gym includes 5 lb., 10 lb. and 15 lb. resistance tubes, 2 foam handles, 2 ankle cuffs, door connector, training DVD, training manual and carrying case. Resistance tubes can be used to strengthen biceps, triceps, abs, chest, lower body and other muscle groups. Secure the resistance tubes in a closed door with the included door connector to do specific exercises. Includes a training manual and a 61 min. training DVD that features professional trainer Mark Verstegen.
